algorithm_technique: Identify problematic friendships, count language needs, and greedily teach the most beneficial language.
problem_summary_simple: Teach minimum people a new language so all friends can communicate.
problem_summary_technical: Find friends who can't communicate, count their language needs, and teach the language that satisfies most problematic friendships.
key_insights: First, identify all friendships where users cannot communicate.
For these problematic friendships, determine which languages are missing for communication.
The problem reduces to finding a single language to teach to the minimum number of people to resolve the most problematic friendships.
